caption.center: KEITH THOMAS, Appellant v. SUE ALLEN, Appellee.

court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Tenth District, Waco.

posture.unpublished:
[EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appealed from the County Court at Law Ellis County, Texas, Trial Court No. 10-C-3789.
Motion granted; appeal dismissed.

panel.unpublished: Before Chief Justice GRAY, Justice REYNA, and Justice DAVIS.

opinion_text.unpublished: Appellant has filed an "Uncontested Motion to Dismiss Appeal." See TEX. R. APP. P. 42.1(a)(1). It states that Appellant and Appellee have entered into a settlement agreement and that Appellee does not oppose dismissal of this appeal. Dismissal of this appeal would not prevent a party from seeking relief to which it would otherwise be entitled. The motion is granted, and the appeal is dismissed.
